name: Johnson and Johnson
description:
## Getting Paid to Get Paid

When a dirty fixer’s been making waves, the community finds a way to police their own. Ms. Johnson hires the team to do work for another fixer in town and report back on what he’s been up to. No need to double cross. No need to do any wetwork. Just get paid to do some other jobs from some small time fixer. What shadowrunner has ever turned down some free money?
